      (ADJP (JJ closed)))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Notice))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB hereby))
      (VP (VBN given)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (NN registration))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (NNP Durian) (NNP Degustation) (NNP X))))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADVP (RB now))
              (VP (VBN opened)))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (SQ (VBZ Is)
    (NP (PRP it))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (NP (DT the) (NNP Tenth))
    (NP
      (NP (NN time))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (VP (VBG doing)
              (NP (DT this)))))))
    (. ?)))

rcmod(time-6, doing-9)
dobj(doing-9, this-10)

                      (ADJP (JJ $)))))))))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD can)
        (VP (VB write)
          (NP (DT a) (NN cheque))
          (PP (TO to) (`` ``)
            (NP (NNP Goducate) (NNP Ltd))
            ('' '')))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (MD will)
        (VP (VB collect)
          (NP (PRP it))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN day))
              (ADVP (PRP itself)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB Please))
    (VP (VB keep)
      (NP (NN everything))
      (ADVP
        (ADVP (RB as) (JJ short)
          (PP (IN as)
            (ADJP (JJ possible))))
        (SBAR (IN so)
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
              (ADVP (RB even))
              (VP (VB need)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB open)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN email)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB read)
                              (NP (PRP it)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


discourse(keep-2, Please-1)
root(ROOT-0, keep-2)
dobj(keep-2, everything-3)
advmod(short-5, as-4)
advmod(keep-2, short-5)
prep(short-5, as-6)
pobj(as-6, possible-7)
mark(need-13, so-8)
nsubj(need-13, we-9)
aux(need-13, do-10)
neg(need-13, n't-11)
advmod(need-13, even-12)
dep(short-5, need-13)
aux(open-15, to-14)
xcomp(need-13, open-15)
det(email-17, the-16)
dobj(open-15, email-17)
aux(read-19, to-18)
infmod(email-17, read-19)
dobj(read-19, it-20)
